snippet: Demetrius Washington, 19, was charged with murder after a dispute between rivals in the Polo Grounds Towers in Manhattan, the authorities said.
abstract: Demetrius Washington of Bronx, NY, is charged with fatally shooting 18-year-old Jordan Barber in Manhattan public housing complex on June 29.
lead_paragraph: Demetrius Washington, 19, was charged with murder after a dispute between rivals in the Polo Grounds Towers in Manhattan, the authorities said.

headline.main: Bronx Man Accused of Killing Rival Crew Member at Housing Project
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Accused of Killing Rival Crew Member at Housing Project
